description: cc:Mail was acquired by Lotus and was incorporated into the Lotus Notes software. However, the CCA format is no longer supported. Microsoft provides a utility called "Exchange Server Importer for Lotus cc:Mail Archives," which can import CCA data into Outlook .PST files. The utility is also called "Microsoft Importer for Lotus cc:Mail Archives."
NOTE: Importer for Lotus ccMail Archives is no longer available for download from Microsoft.
